mdRecord.dcterms:title: Kelley Family Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
There are two Kelley Cemeteries located on adjacent farms on Kelleys Drive SE, which is off Franklin Pike just beyond the Blue Ridge Parkway on the right. Both are visible using Google Earth.
Kelley Family Cemetery (aka: Kelley-Peters) GPS N 36 57.745 W 80 9.363
Kelley Cemetery #2 GPS N 36 57.591 W 80 9.320
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
